name: Sudoku (itch) (Simple Graphics Studios)
description:
Sudoku is a famous number puzzle in which all 81 fields in the 9x9 grid must be correctly filled with numbers. This version of the game is the most frequently played variant. (get more information in the game)

Features

- Play multiple Games and save them.
- 4 elaborated levels of difficulty: easy, normal, difficult and extreme.
- With the history system you can always check your results.
- You can set your favorite games as favorites.
- check your statistics in your (offline) profile.
- All setting options that make playing easier for you.
- modern and suitable design.
- Compare yourself to other players and collect achievements using the Google Play Games Services. (optional)
